ygData.subject: RE: Level 38 Song
ygData.msgSnippet: I have found that my songs seem to get better with age - a few levels after getting them, they seem to do lots better.  Maybe it s the skill that needs to
ygData.messageBody:
I have found that my songs seem to "get better with age" - a few levels
after getting them, they seem to do lots better. Maybe it's the skill that
needs to improve (when you first get a brass song) or they actually have
some code that bases resists on how old the song is? Also the level of the
song compared to the mob?

But yes - I use the earliest songs when I want the least resists. And
perhaps the mobs are more resistant to the type of magic of the newer song
than the older one?

And I have been a bad bard <tsk tsk> lev 37 and 38 songs are waiting for me
in the bard guild still. Not like the old days where you really looked
forward to making a level and getting a good song. <sigh>

Sylly

p.s.

HI HARM!!!!! (just cuz I _know_ how you _love_ all caps <hehe>)


-----Original Message-----
From: Angela.Kurtz@...
[mailto:Angela.Kurtz@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 4:15 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com; EQ-Bards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Level 38 Song

From: Angela.Kurtz@...

I was wondering if anyone is having the same problem I am
with the level 38
song.
EVERYTHING resists me! I find it very funny that EVERYTHING
RESISTS a level
38 song (Chant) but almost nothing resists a level 12 song
(Bellow). Can
anyone confirm for me that this song actually works???? It
isn't doing a
thing for me!

Thanx,

Isabo Donjour
Tarew Marr
